oldProfile.title: Profile
oldProfile.aboutMeText: An expert in technology and digital transformation. I have worked with leading companies in developing technical solutions for the public and global forum in Saudi Arabia.
oldProfile.aboutTextTwo: From Saudi Arabia to European destinations to finance education using technology.
oldProfile.aboutText: GRF (Global Resource Finder) helps you stay connected with the latest news, weather updates, and global information. Version 1.0.0
